column4: what is the name of the text browser that comes installed on ubuntu?
you'd have to boot into recovery mode oui?
how do you turn it off?
all I have for that is use the tet box font and colors and automatic nick completeion options
xchat-gnome?   i dunno, i've got a "spell check" checkbox there
i assume you have aspell or ispell?  maybe it hides the widget if you don't have spellcheck libs installed.
hmm, looks like it was compiled with: --enable-spell=none
arrows when in insert don't work
when in insert it is often faster
